description: Numbers n such that n through n+4 all have same number of divisors.
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: with(numtheory); A049051:=proc(q,w) local k,ok,n;for n from 1 to q do ok:=1;for k from 1 to w do if tau(n)<>tau(n+k) then ok:=0; break; fi; od;if ok=1 then print(n); fi; od; end: A049051(10^6,4); # _Paolo P. Lava_, May 03 2013
author: _David W. Wilson_
